name: Flying Car Simulator: Jet Truck - Airplane Pilot
name_original: Flying Car Simulator: Jet Truck - Airplane Pilot
description:
Tired of classic truck simulators? Want do fly your jet truck like an airplane? This game is for you! Fly around the world travel beautiful landscapes be the best pilot.
------
[Game Features]
• Stunning HD Graphics
• Realistic and dynamic car physics
• Beautiful Landscapes
• Easy to Play
• Free to Play


Enjoy ツ
